TopicTitle: Who else has had this brilliant idea?

Articles.Content: Who else has plans to deorbit a asteroid onto a planet once 0.24 comes out?
Some of us are planning on crashing the asteroid on Kerbin. The rest of us are planning on landing the asteroid on Kerbin.
I am planning to Crash Asteroids into Asteroids to create a Counter Kerbin on the opposite side of the Sun
I'm going to use them for station cores through careful implementation of the Claw.
Perhaps landing one in the water trying to get a tsunami?
I'm gonna land one at my Minmus Base for SCIENCE! (No, not actually on the base)(<-Though, that would be an interesting experiment)
Makes me think of this Manley video I watched earlier, http://youtu.be/38IYZUizX3E?t=10m25s
I want to see if I can send it to another planet and crash it there

Hm...good idea...I will try that when .24 comes out . Though I think it might not do much, other than a small explosion then nothing, unless it is given special explosion characteristics.

Edited March 15, 2014 by mythbusters844
Im gonna redirect it to Duna FOR SCIENCE !!!! *Jeb jumps away from the hatch and explodes*

I'd love to see if I could cluster a few of them and then launch a final one at the cluster to play the largest game of marbles in the solar system lets see how many collisions I can create with 1 shot.
im going to impact an asteroid against another asteroid!
Kerbin... Pshhh, that's for beginners... Real challenge is to put it into the front doors of the VAB!!
Meanwhile whackjob will have a pile of them next to KSC visible from orbit regardless of rendering distance.

Meanwhile whackjob will have a pile of them next to KSC visible from orbit regardless of rendering distance.

"That one there is my favorite."
Why not, land the asteroid, then make it into the core of a giant hovering platform?

I'm going to send the asteroid into the kerbol.

Why?

For !SCIENCE!of course!
I shall make a tower of asteroids on Gilly
I guess the first step will be crashing into asteroids...

I guess the first step will be crashing into asteroids...

I can only imagine it would be quite fun to see how an impact would affect the orbit of these asteroids.
I want to either give Eeloo a new moonlet, or give Minmus or Gilly an asteroid belt.

Some of us are planning on crashing the asteroid on Kerbin. The rest of us are planning on landing the asteroid on Kerbin.

and whackjob is probably planning on landing an asteroid on every single planet and moon that will support a physical landing and then throwing an asteroid into Jool AND Kerbol! whatcha say Sir Whackjob, am I right?

I want to try and recreate the Magic Boulder by towing an asteroid into Ike orbit. Or, alternatively, taunt the Magic Boulder by placing an asteroid on the same plane orbiting in the opposite direction.

im going to impact an asteroid against another asteroid!

Bowling! Excellent idea!
I will give Dres a moon(let). And then i will find small enough asteroid, tow it around until its orbit is retrograde-ish - and then i will slam it into another asteroid at several km/s
